dcterms:creator: R. Wang
X. Fang
Y. Lu
S. Wang
dcterms:description: The PDBbind database collects a wealth of protein–ligand complex structures and related experimental binding affinity data, making it the most widely used dataset for structure-based protein–ligand binding affinity prediction studies.
dcterms:title: PDBbind-v2020

dcterms:description: A curated dataset derived from PDBbind, retaining only crystal structure data with exact Kd values.
dcterms:title: PDBbindGS_HiQ

dcterms:description: The dataset is generated through re-docking of structures from the PDBbind refined set using AutoDock Vina.
dcterms:title: PDBbindRS_RD

dcterms:description: The dataset is created through a cross-docking protocol involving structures from the PDBbind refined set.
dcterms:title: PDBbindRS_CD

dcterms:creator: M. Su
Q. Yang
Y. Du
G. Feng
Z. Liu
Y. Li
R. Wang
dcterms:description: The CASF-2016 benchmark consists of different protein–ligand complexes with high-resolution crystal structures and reliable binding constants, obtained through systematically non-redundant sampling from the PDBbind database.
dcterms:title: CASF-2016 benchmark

dcterms:creator: J. B. J. Dunbar
R. D. Smith
C.-Y. Yang
P. M.-U. Ung
K. W. Lexa
N. A. Khazanov
J. A. Stuckey
S. Wang
H. A. Carlson
dcterms:description: The CSAR-NRC HiQ benchmark primarily serves to evaluate the efficacy of various scoring algorithms, encompassing a collection of protein–ligand complexes.
dcterms:title: CSAR-NRC HiQ benchmark

dcterms:creator: C. E. M. Schindler
dcterms:description: The Merck FEP benchmark is designed to assess the precision of various computational approaches in determining relative binding free energies based on fundamental physical principles.
dcterms:title: Merck FEP benchmark

dcterms:creator: V.-K. Tran-Nguyen
C. Jacquemard
D. Rognan
dcterms:description: LIT-PCBA is a benchmark specifically designed for the comparative evaluation of virtual screening, relying on experimental biological activity data from the PubChem BioAssay database.
dcterms:title: LIT-PCBA benchmark
